TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ChannelFactoryBase extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelManagerBase implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject
Public MustInherit Class ChannelFactoryBase Inherits ChannelManagerBase Implements IChannelFactory
type ChannelFactoryBase = class inherit ChannelManagerBase interface IChannelFactory interface ICommunicationObject

summary.span: 为所有自定义通道工厂提供一个通用基实现。

span.span: Provides a common base implementation for all custom channel factories.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此基类可以创建自定义通道工厂。Use this base class to create a custom channel factory. 类派生自 类，并实现 接口以便创建通道。The class derives from the class and implements the interface for creating channels. 这些方法处理参数验证，然后委托给派生类可重写的受保护方法、虚方法或抽象方法。The methods handle parameter validation and then delegate to protected, virtual or abstract methods that derived classes can override. 每个受保护的虚方法都自动与 接口的其他方法（包括状态转换方法）进行同步。Each of the protected virtual methods is automatically synchronized with respect to the other methods on the interface (including the state transition methods). 这意味着，无需额外锁定即可确保该对象在方法体内的状态一致。This means that no additional locking is required to ensure that the object is in a consistent state inside the method body.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在交换消息时，默认的 构造函数使用服务模型超时值对超时属性进行初始化。The default constructor initializes timeout properties with the service model timeout values when exchanging messages. 打开、发送和关闭操作的默认值为 1 分钟，接收操作的默认值为 10 分钟。The default value is 1 minute for open, send, and close operations and 10 minutes for the receive operation. 若要为这些操作超时指定其他值，请使用 。Use if you want to specify other values for these operation timeouts.

protected: ChannelFactoryBase();

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在交换消息时，无参数的构造函数将初始化超时属性与服务模型的超时值。The parameterless constructor initializes timeout properties with the service model timeout values when exchanging messages. 打开、发送和关闭操作的默认值为 1 分钟，接收操作的默认值为 10 分钟。The default value is 1 minute for open, send, and close operations and 10 minutes for the receive operation. 若要为这些操作超时指定其他值，请使用 。Use if you want to specify other values for these operation timeouts.

param.name: timeouts
param.span: ，指定交换消息时打开、发送、接收和关闭操作的默认超时。

span.span: The specifying the default timeouts for open, send, receive, and close operations when exchanging messages.

summary.span: 使用指定的默认通信超时初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with specified default communication timeouts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要为打开、发送、接收和关闭操作超时指定自定义值（而不是使用服务模型的默认值），请使用而不是无参数构造函数。Use instead of the parameterless constructor if you want to specify custom values for the open, send, receive, and close operation timeouts instead of using the service model default values.

summary.span: 获取为完成关闭操作提供的默认时间间隔。

span.span: Gets the default interval of time provided for a close operation to complete.

value.span: 默认的 ，指定在超时前可用于完成关闭操作的时间。

span.span: The default that specifies how long the close operation has to complete before timing out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值在创建新的 对象时设置。This value is set when creating a new object. 默认 构造函数将 属性的值设置为 1 分钟。The default constructor sets the property to a value of 1 minute. 如果要为此超时指定其他值，请使用 。Use if you want to specify another value for this timeout.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance !!T GetProperty<class T>() cil managed

abstract member GetProperty : unit -> 'T (requires 'T : null) override this.GetProperty : unit -> 'T (requires 'T : null)

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 方法正在查询的类型化对象。

span.span: The typed object for which the method is querying.

summary.span: 从通道堆栈的适当层返回所请求的类型化对象（如果存在）。

span.span: Returns a typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the channel stack.

returns.span: 如果存在，则为所请求的类型化对象 T，如果不存在，则为 。

span.span: The typed object T requested if it is present or if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可请求从通道工厂堆栈的适当层返回类型化对象，如用于设置属性或获取状态的接口。Use this to request a typed object such as an interface for setting properties or getting status from the appropriate layer in the channel factory stack. 如果某个层支持返回所请求的对象，则该层会返回对象。If a layer supports returning the requested object, it returns it. 如果不支持，则该层仅仅将调用委托给堆栈中的下一层。If not, it simply delegates the call down to the next layer in the stack. 如果到达堆栈底部仍然没有通道工厂层支持所请求的对象，则该方法返回 `null`。If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no channel factory layer supported the requested object, then the method returns `null`. 这类似于 COM + 的 QueryService 接口。This is similar to COM+'s QueryService interface.

summary.span: 在调用了一个同步中止操作，从而引起通信对象转换为关闭状态的情况下，该方法插入对通信对象的处理。

span.span: Inserts processing on a communication object after it transitions to the closing state due to the invocation of a synchronous abort operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现为空。The default implementation is empty.

param.name: timeout
param.span: ，指定在超时前必须完成关闭操作的时间。

span.span: The that specifies how long the on close operation has to complete before timing out.

span.span: The delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous operation on close completion.

span.span: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous on close operation.

summary.span: 开始一个异步操作来关闭工厂创建的每个通道。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to close each of the channels that were created by the factory.
The that references the asynchronous on close operation.
